page.title: 05PAGE 4 CONTINUED
page.content: pollute the air and ruin the crops.There are no windbreakers for the crops. The{Farming}is modern with plenty of modern equipment:- combine harvesters and potato mashers.None of the farmers have cattle because of nearby pollution and unfertile land for animals. { }The{Trade}is a repair shop which joins onto the main farm.It mainly deals with farm machines and sometimes doing lorry bodies. { Transport}is not very good at all because a sharp three-point junction,all under 90 degrees turns. The{Entertainment}is T.V. if you have one.If you don't you go to the nearest town which is Scunthorpe where you can go to the cinema or a pub.Most houses have a T.V.,video,stereo.
